General.Name: Stuve Gold Corp
General.Description: Stuve Gold Corp. engages in the exploration and evaluation of mineral properties in Chile. It explores for gold, copper, silver, and cobalt ores. The company's portfolio includes Coba SW Property that consists of 5 and 13 exploration claims covering an area of 1,262 hectares; the El Bosque Property that consists of 90 exploration claims covering an area of 25,800 hectares; the ROMA Property that consists of 12 exploration claims covering an area of 3,500 hectares located in northeast of Ovalle, Chile; and Santa Gracia property, which covers an area of 11,500 hectares located in the Santa Gracia district of Northern Chile. It also has an option agreement to acquire 100% interests in the Inca property that covers an area of 2,941 hectares. Stuve Gold Corp. is headquartered in Calgary, Canada.
General.Address: 903 - 8th Avenue SW, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2P 0P7
